nodes.text: Patrolians were a species from the world Patrolia in the Inner Rim of The galaxy.

Members of the species were distinguished by their pale, pastel-colored scales and long, fin-like limbs. They could resist minor electrocutions. The bounty hunter Robonino was a member of this species, as was the criminal Bannamu. Another member of the species was seen in a cantina in the Coruscant underworld.
The Patrolian design was based on unused Episode I Jedi concept art by Iain McCaig, which appeared in the Star Wars: Episode I Insider's Guide.
